mapper.update: update memberinfo set status = 0, ref_date = sysdate where memid=#{memid}

update emp_info set hiredate = NVL(#{hiredate}, hiredate), job = NVL(#{job}, job), status = NVL(#{status}, status), ref_date = NVL(#{ref_date}, ref_date), sal = NVL(#{sal}, sal) where empid = #{empid}
mapper.select: select a.mem_name, a.email, to_char(a.birthday, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as birthday, a.gender, a.postalCode, a.address, a.addr_detail, a.mobile, a.mem_degree, a.major, b.* from memberinfo a, emp_info b where a.memid=b.empid and b.empid=#{empid}
select count(*) from emp_info
select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select a.mem_name, a.email, a.mobile, a.birthday, b.* from memberinfo a, emp_info b where a.memid=b.empid)list) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update memberinfo set status = 1, ref_date = sysdate where memid=#{memid}
update certiinfo set status = 'EXP' where expiry < sysdate
mapper.select: select count(*) from memberinfo where ${search} like '%${keyword}%'

select * from (select rownum r, a.*, b.status_name from (select * from memberinfo where ${search} like '%${keyword}%' order by regdate desc) a, member_status b where a.status=b.status) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update memberinfo set status=0, ref_date = sysdate where status = 2 and ref_date <= sysdate-(interval'7'day)
update memberinfo set status=5, ref_date=sysdate where status = 0 and to_char(ref_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= to_char(sysdate-(interval'1'year), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
update emp_board set readCnt = readCnt+1 where ebnum=#{ebnum}
mapper.select: select * from emp_board where ebnum=#{ebnum}
mapper.insert: insert into emp_board values( eb_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{post_content}, #{writer}, 1, 0, sysdate, 0 )
mapper.select: select count(*) from emp_board where status=0
select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select * from emp_board where status=0 order by reg desc) list) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select count(*) from post_board
board_type=#{board_type} and
subject like '%${keyword}%' or post_content like '%${keyword}%'

select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select * from post_board a left join boardtype b on a.board_type=b.board_type
a.board_type = #{board_type} and
subject like '%${keyword}%' or post_content like '%${keyword}%'
order by reg desc) list ) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from (select memid, count(*) as reportCnt from member_report group by memid) rep, memberinfo info where info.memid=rep.memid and info.status=0
select count(*) from certiinfo where to_char(registDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_char(sysdate-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from memberinfo where to_char(regDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_char(sysdate-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from memberinfo where to_char(regDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from post_board where board_type = 3 and post_level=0
select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select * from post_board where board_type = 3 and post_level=0 order by reg) list) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update certiinfo set status = #{status} where cnum=#{cnum}

update certidate
docRegStart1 = NVL(TO_DATE(#{docRegStart1},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), docRegStart1),
docRegEnd1 = TO_DATE(#{docRegEnd1},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docRegStart2 = NVL(TO_DATE(#{docRegStart2},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),docRegStart2),
docRegEnd2 = TO_DATE(#{docRegEnd2},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docTestStart = TO_DATE(#{docTestStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docTestEnd = TO_DATE(#{docTestEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docResultStart = TO_DATE(#{docResultStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docResultEnd = TO_DATE(#{docResultEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docSubmitStart = TO_DATE(#{docSubmitStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
docSubmitEnd = TO_DATE(#{docSubmitEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracRegStart1 = TO_DATE(#{pracRegStart1},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracRegEnd1 = TO_DATE(#{pracRegEnd1},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracRegStart2 = TO_DATE(#{pracRegStart2},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracRegEnd2 = TO_DATE(#{pracRegEnd2},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracTestStart = TO_DATE(#{pracTestStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracTestEnd = TO_DATE(#{pracTestEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracResStart = TO_DATE(#{pracResStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
pracResEnd = TO_DATE(#{pracResEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),
where datepk = #{datePK}
mapper.select: select * from certidate where datepk = #{datePK}

select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select b.* from certischedule a, certiinfo b where a.cnum=b.cnum and a.cyear=#{cyear} and a.cround=#{cround} and a.clevel=#{clevel} order by a.cnum) list) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from member_report where wr_option ='P' and pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.update:
update memberinfo
status = #{status},
mem_level = '', mem_point = 0,
ref_date = sysdate
where memid=#{memid}
mapper.select: select a.cert_name, a.expirydate, b.* from (select * from member_cert where memid=#{memid}) a left join certiinfo b on a.cnum=b.cnum
select b.* from (select * from member_like where memid=#{memid}) a, certiinfo b where a.cnum=b.cnum
select count(*) from (select pnum, count(*) as reportCnt from member_report where memid=#{memid} and wr_option='C' group by pnum)

select a.reportcnt, a.comm_num, b.comm_content, b.reg, b.pnum, b.status from (select pnum as comm_num, count(*) as reportCnt from member_report where memid=#{memid} and wr_option='C' group by pnum) a left join comm_board b on a.comm_num=b.comm_num
select count(*) from (select pnum, count(*) as reportCnt from member_report where memid=#{memid} and wr_option='P' group by pnum)

select a.pnum, b.subject, a.reportcnt, c.board_type, c.board_mapping, c.board_name from (select pnum, count(*) as reportCnt from member_report where memid=#{memid} and wr_option='P' group by pnum) a left join post_board b on a.pnum=b.pnum left join boardtype c on b.board_type=c.board_type
select status_name from member_status where status=#{status}

select count(*) from memberinfo
where status=#{status}
select count(*) from certiinfo where ${search} like '%${keyword}%'
select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select * from certiinfo where ${search} like '%${keyword}%') list) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by cnum

select count(*) from certiinfo
where category = #{category}
select * from certidate where cnum=#{cnum}
select * from certi_requirement where cnum=#{cnum}
select * from certischedule where cnum=#{cnum}
select * from certiinfo where cnum=#{cnum}
select ${sequence}.nextval from dual
select last_number from seq where sequence_name = #{sequence}
mapper.insert: insert into certi_requirement values( #{cnum}, #{req_degree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{req_age, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{req_exp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pre_requisite, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ref} )
insert into certiSchedule values ( #{cnum}, #{cyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nvl(#{cround}, 0), #{clevel}, sysdate )

insert into certiInfo values ( #{cnum}, #{cname}, #{category}, #{clevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cutline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{expiry, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncs_cat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )

insert into certidate values( #{cnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyear}, #{cround}, #{clevel}, to_date(#{docRegStart1} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docRegEnd1} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docRegStart2} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docRegEnd2} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docTestStart} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docTestEnd} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docResultStart} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docResultEnd} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docSubmitStart} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{docSubmitEnd} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracRegStart1} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracRegEnd1} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracRegStart2} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracRegEnd2} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracTestStart} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracTestEnd} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracResStart} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{pracResEnd} DEFAULT null ON CONVERSION ERROR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), CERTIDATE_SEQ.nextval )
